getStarted.title: Fast, simple & convenient
getStarted.description: Сreate and manage a queue of your clients. Customers do not need to download the app and register — they can queue and receive notifications via SMS

rightNow.description: Send an SMS with the keyword BREWER to the service number +16138006817 and get your place in the queue

step_1.title: How it works
step_1.description: Register in the service. Simple, fast and clear.

step_2.description: You create a new queue for your clients and tell them the unique keyword.

step_3.description: The client sends the unique keyword to the service number and receives the sequence number in this queue.

step_4.description: The client receives an SMS notification that their turn has come.

startNow.title: Start now
startNow.description: And you get the opportunity to control the entire process.
